https://tmrev.io/movie/226572-An Unusual Affair 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sffrfXCRN86NQmDsec8cvbiv8Rf.jpg Jochen Wenzel, a young teacher, married with two kids, one day surprisingly falls in love with a young male colleague, Tom Leuthner and they begin an unusual affair (= "Eine aussergewöhnliche Affäre"). While Ina, Jochen's wife, worries about Jochen's distanced behavior without having a clue of her husband's affair, Jochen and Tom seriously fall for each other. Torn between his family and his new love, Jochen has to make a decision. Written by Smoothhoney An Unusual Affair
